title: The Jo Jo Capone Episode
itunes:title: The Jo Jo Capone Episode
description:
Today we had the pleasure of chopping it up with Chi-Raq's Jo Jo Capone. James and Jo Jo discussed his upbringing in the system, his rise in the street ranks and much more. They also have a long discussion about the legendary Dr. Sebi as Jo Jo recounts him curing a man of cancer and paralysis. It get's deep! We apologize for not dropping in a while but it's real out here. James lost his cousin to this virus, so we are staying as safe as we can. We will be dropping content a few times a week to make up for the lapse. In the meantime make sure to check in with us on Instagram @thegangsterchroniclespodcast Much Love & Stay Safe! Specials. The biggest way to support the show is by showing love to our sponsors. We only advertise brands personally use, so show them some love and take advantage of the savings. Ray J makes some dope earbuds. They are way better than the overpriced beats and comfortable and way less expensive. Save 15% on Raycom earbuds by clicking this link. The bass is slapping! www.BUYRAYCOM.com/TGC101 KEEPS can prevent hair loss... If your Dad's hairline has went George Jefferson, more than likely it's gonna happen to you, but you can prevent it. Hit the link to get a month free www.keeps.com/tgc101 See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
